Test Name: Sarcoma Targeted Gene Fusion/Rearrangement Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Specimen Type: Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded (FFPE) sarcoma tumor tissue (blocks or slides)
Purpose: Accurate detection of clinically relevant gene fusions and rearrangements in sarcoma tumors to aid diagnosis and treatment decisions.
Container: FFPE tissue block or glass slide
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher platform), PCR thermocycler, bioanalyzer
